title: Father of Palestinian American Boy Slain Outside Chicago Files Wrongful Death Lawsuit
description: The father of a 6-year-old Palestinian American boy fatally stabbed in what authorities allege was a hate crime has filed a wrongful death lawsuit.

title: The Israel-Hamas War Reveals the Fundamental Flaws of Social Media
description: The content circulating social media offers a very poor representation of the truth of what happened on Oct. 7 in Israel.

title: The Pentagon Says U.S. Warship, Commercial Ships Have Come Under Attack in the Red Sea
description: An American warship and multiple commercial ships came under attack Sunday in the Red Sea, the Pentagon said.

title: Philippine President Blames Militants for a Bombing That Killed 4 Worshippers at Catholic Mass
description: The Philippine president blamed “foreign terrorists” for a bomb blast that killed four and wounded dozens of other Catholic worshippers.
